entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
